thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Ping An Insurance Involving 3.75 BLn Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Ping An Insurance Involving 3.75 BLn Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shanghai exchange filing shows block trade of ping an insurance involving

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Shanghai Stock Exchange
* FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF PING AN INSURANCE GROUP'S 50 MILLION A-SHARES INVOLVING 3.75 BILLION YUAN ($588.56 million) ON JAN 24 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2yJZikT Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3715 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
